text: Hello! Does anyone know how to have a Rich Text editor default to a specific font?
Funny enough, I went back in a few days later and they were minimized.  Going forward I'll just give it a day to run all my tests I guess.

I have a module showing featured posts, and I want to use larger images. For some reason, {{ content.featured_image }} defaults to showing a version of the image that is 352px wide. The image path looks like this: cigar.jpg?*width=352*&name=cigar.jpg

How can I get it to return a larger image?

This does not work:
{{ resize_image_url(content.featured_image, 1440, 0, 0) }}
{{ resize_image_url(content.featured_image, 1440) }}
{{ content.featured_image }}?width=1440

My original image is 1440px wide and is already optimized.

*Finally figured it out: {{ content.featured_image }}?noresize*

leaving this up in case it helps anyone else.
